casebody.data:
MARTIN
v.
SLAGEL 210P16-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 27, 2018 Michael T. Wood, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorneys General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Dale P. Martin, for Martin, Dale Patrick

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of November 2018 by Petitioner to Rebut Answer Response to Habeas Corpus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of November 2018."
